programme.title: Episode 1: The Solar System
programme.desc: Inside Outer Space: Episode 1: The Solar System, S01E01, This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Episode 6: Fermi paradox
programme.desc: Inside Outer Space: Episode 6: Fermi paradox, S01E06, Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see.

programme.desc: Inside Outer Space: Episode 5: Space Missions, S01E05, Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see.

programme.desc: Inside Outer Space: Episode 7: The Milky Way, S01E07, Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see.

programme.title: Episode 8: Extravehicular Activity
programme.desc: Inside Outer Space: Episode 8: Extravehicular Activity, S01E08, Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see.

programme.title: Episode 4: Black Holes
programme.desc: Inside Outer Space: Episode 4: Black Holes, S01E04, Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see.

programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E01, Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E03, Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. Camera Tracking - The array of special cameras that follow a spacecraft at launch. The International Space Station - The building and operation.

programme.title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E04, Project Gemini Commences - Did Gemini give the US a lead in the space race? Venus Express - The last days of ESA's Venus probe. EMU - NASA's Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Deep Space Communications - ESA's worldwide network of giant dishes.

programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E05, Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E06, Project Gemini: Docking and EVA - In the final phase of the Gemini program NASA struggles with docking and spacewalks. Curiosity Roving Mars - On the surface of Mars the Curiosity rover is changing the way we think about the red planet.

programme.title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E07, The Apollo Program Begins - At the very beginning of NASA's moon project things go wrong. Caves - ESA's special training program for astronauts. Planck - Mapping the cosmic microwave background radiation.

programme.title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E08, Rebuilding Project Apollo - After the Apollo 1 disaster NASA resumes manned space flight. Orbiting Carbon Observatory 2 - Monitoring the Earth's Co2 levels in unprecedented detail. Zero Gravity Training - Parabolic flights.

programme.title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E09, Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E10, To the Moon - The Apollo program achieves its major objective. Dragon, Falcon and Spacex - New directions in re-usable spacecraft. Gaia- Mapping our galaxy in unprecedented detail.

programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E11, The Beginning of the End - After the first Moon landing the Apollo science program was about to start in earnest but people were losing interest. Apollo Gets Complicated - New technology is added that extends the reach of the Apollo program.

programme.title: The Shuttle Program, The Challenger Disaster & Return to Space
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E12, The Shuttle Program - The first re-useable spacecraft. The Challenger Disaster - Pressing launch schedules lead to carelessness and the loss of the Challenger. Return to Space - A re-designed shuttle is back in space with a redefined role.

programme.title: The Space Shuttle Matures, Complex Space Construction & The Final Years of the Space Shuttle
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E13, The Space Shuttle Matures - The Space Transportation System changes the nature of orbital missions. Complex Construction in Space - Confidence in the shuttle begins to return and engineers for get the lessons of the past.

programme.title: INCREASING ORBIT
programme.desc: The New Frontier: INCREASING ORBIT, S05E05, The ISS is the workhorse of the international spacefaring community, but its days are numbered. R

programme.title: Set Course For Heart of the Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Set Course For Heart of the Sun, S04E02, NASA’S Parker Solar Probe Mission is on its way and will be shortly followed by Europe’s Solar probe Mission.

programme.title: Flight Status
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Flight Status, S03E03, The latest updates on the new space hardware about to launch us into the next generation of space flight some rockets and capsules are on time others not so fortunate.

programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Slingshot, S03E06, Sending probes throughout the solar system is a mathematicians dream and an engineers nightmare, sling shotting probes around other planets to arrive at their destination.

programme.title: Stars Above
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Stars Above, S02E09, Stars are a bit like human beings. They can be warm or cold, they come in all kinds of shapes and sizes.

RISING TIDES, S05E03, The next generation of Earth observation satellites are now in place maintaining the continuity of long-term climate data, in particular the planets rising temperatures and related ocean levels.

programme.title: Invasion on Mars
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Invasion on Mars, S03E04, The EXO Mars and Curiosity continue their scientific discoveries as we prepare new missions both robotic and manned to the Red planet Mars.

programme.title: Hyabusa
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Hyabusa, S04E05, The Japanese Asteroid sample return mission has reached its target and is surveying the space rock ready to dip down and take a sample.

programme.title: Living In Space
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living In Space, S03E01, How do astronauts cope with living in space? The unique environment, the lack of taste in their food and the smell of canned air all contribute to the stresses of living and working in space.

programme.title: GIANTS IN THE DARK
programme.desc: The New Frontier: GIANTS IN THE DARK, S05E06, Asteroids, the debris from the early solar system hold tantalizing clues to planetary formation. The spacecraft Psyche readies to study a unique metallic asteroid.

programme.title: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle, S03E05, For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Windows to Other Worlds / Fountain of Creation
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E13, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Fermi Paradox
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Fermi Paradox, S04E05, The Fermi Paradox asks the ultimate question: Given a few reasonable assumptions about the chance of life arising elsewhere in the universe and the distance between the stars, why has an alien civilization not presented itself?

programme.title: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone, S04E03, Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Snakedance, S05E04, As the festivities begin, nothing seemingly stands between the Mara and its spectacular return... except the Doctor and a crazy old man in the mountains.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Mawdryn Undead, S01E01, Caught in a warp ellipse, the TARDIS is drawn to a huge spacecraft orbiting Earth whereupon the Doctor is separated in space and time from Nyssa and Tegan.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Mawdryn Undead, S01E02, At Brendon School, the Doctor enlists the help of the Brigadier. At Brendon School, Tegan enlists the help of the Brigadier. Same man, different time periods, however.

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Mawdryn Undead, S01E03, Mawdryn and his eternal mutants are awake and reveal the truth, they are exiles, they are in pain and need something only the Doctor can give them. His future lives.

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Mawdryn Undead, S01E04, As the Doctor’s ethics are challenged and the two Brigadier's finally meet, Turlough plots with the Black Guardian to bring the Time Lord down once and for all.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The King's Demons, S01E01, At a medieval joust between Frenchman Sir Gilles and Hugh Fitzwilliam, the TARDIS appears. King John seems more curious than alarmed, as is Sir Gilles...

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The King's Demons, S01E02, The Master and the Doctor fight for control over Kamelion’s mind while Turlough and Tegan make new allies in the castle in an attempt to avoid the iron maiden.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Five Doctors, S01E01, Someone is stealing the Doctor's past incarnations from the timestream. The present Doctor must act fast to survive.

programme.title: Eyes of a Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E13, On February 2, 2010, two masked gunmen commit a violent robbery and shoot Michael Temple Jr., rendering him a quadriplegic for five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA is used to create a sketch of the killer.

programme.title: Dark Angel
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E14, 13 days after Pam Pitts disappears in 1988 her charred body is found at a popular hangout spot in the Arizona desert. When a second victim is discovered in a mineshaft, detectives suspect the killer may have known them both.

programme.title: Friday Night Ghosts
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E15, In late 1983, the bodies of five people abducted from a local fast food restaurant are found brutally murdered. The main suspect is long believed to be a well-connected local man, until new evidence reveals the true killers.

programme.title: The Clock Strikes Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E16, When 23-year-old Tonya McKinley is found brutally murdered on New Years Day 1985, a little boy is left motherless. A family must wait 35 years for advancements in forensic science to finally catch a killer using familial DNA.

programme.title: Sisters In Death
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E17, March 1984. Jack Kennedy discovers his daughters brutally murdered. Their mother and niece spend their lives keeping the case alive. DNA leads nowhere. 30 years later, an informant gives up a name.

programme.title: One Tough Mother
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E18, In July 1997, the brutal murder of 19-year-old Tiffany Johnston rocks the small town of Bethany, Oklahoma. DNA points to her killer over a decade later and leads investigators across state lines.

programme.title: Written In Blood
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E19, In July of 1970, the brutal murder of single mom Loretta Jones leaves four-year-old Heidi motherless. Nearly 40 years later, she vows to solve her mother's cold case.

programme.title: Cold Ashes
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E20, When a deadly house fire claims the life of a family in rural Oklahoma, investigators suspect foul play and it sends a mother on a decades-long crusade to find out what happened to her missing teenage daughter and best friend.

programme.title: Queen of the Ozarks
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E21, In June 1985, a 20-year-old "Sucker Day" Festival Queen is found brutalized. The small community of Nixa, Missouri, is certain her blood is on the hands of a local wealthy businessman, but after 25 years DNA reveals the true killer.

programme.title: The Bone Keeper
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E22, In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's skull fractures point to murder; but it will be decades before investigators can find his killer.

programme.title: A is for Arson
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E23, Firefighter Gary Parks is killed in a fire ruled arson, the investigation into his death shifts to homicide. A serial arsonist is thought to be the culprit.

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E24, Just two years into their marriage, Chuck and Cheryl Hall are torn apart when Chuck finds Cheryl murdered. Though Cheryl's family is certain they know her killer, the law isn't as sure. After several decades, a DNA match erases all doubt.

programme.title: The Lost Patient
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E25, In 1979 Janie Landers disappears from a home for the impaired--the latest consequence of the facility's history of neglect. When Janie's body is found, there are many suspects but it is years before the killer is found.

programme.title: Missing and Murdered
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E26, In Cree culture, a promise is sacred. When Cree woman Shirley Soosay goes missing in 1980, her niece Violet promises her grandmother that she will bring Shirley home.

programme.title: Lone Survivor
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E27, In early 1984, three-year-old Vanessa Bennett becomes the lone survivor of her family's brutal murder. Initial investigators suspect a serial killer is at large, but decades pass before DNA narrows the suspect pool to one man.

programme.title: Killer in the Storm
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E01, In the heart of Cajun country, young mother Brenda DuPont is found murdered in her home in May 1988. The initial investigation sputters and turns cold, but her sister Linda vows to solve her murder.

programme.title: Gone in a New York Minute
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E02, In a city of eight million, landlord Bruce Blackwood disappears without a trace in March 2006. Though there is no body, the NYPD is sure this is a homicide and they spend the next nine years searching for answers.
MST3K: Doctor Mordrid, 20220610000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch as the magical DOCTOR MORDRID (1992) defends Earth from the forces of evil, and Dr. Kabahl schemes to increase viewership.
MST3K: The Batwoman, 20220819000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch a scantily-clad Mexican superhero take on a mad scientist and his aquatic super-soldiers in THE BATWOMAN (1968).
MST3K: Robot Wars, 20220507000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch ROBOT WARS (1993). A new SOL is introduced and a new Gizmonic tech arrives.
MST3K: The Million Eyes Of Sumuru, 20220902000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch an evil woman bent on world domination in THE MILLION EYES OF SUMURU (1967). The bots realize Jonah is tall.

programme.title: Last Of The Wild Horses
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Last Of The Wild Horses, S06E11, A cowboy winds up in the middle of a turf war between a rancher and his neighbors in Last of the Wild Horses.
MST3K: The Bubble, 20221111000000 +0000, Joel's crew watch as a married couple find themselves trapped in a mysterious town in THE BUBBLE (1966). The test subjects hatch a plan to escape.
MST3K: The Mask, 20221028000000 +0000, For MST3K's first-ever Halloween episode, Jonah's crew watch THE MASK (1961) in 3D! Jonah teaches the bots about Halloween.
MST3K: Munchie, 20220527000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch as a child befriends MUNCHIE (1992). Jonah refuses to go back into the theater and suffers the consequences.
Film Crew: The Wild Women of Wongo, 20070911070000 +0000, Bob Honcho orders the Film Crew to provide a commentary track for the bizarre prehistoric adventure film, The Wild Women of Wongo (1958).
The Boys Next Door, 19960204000000 +0000, Four mentally handicapped adult men and their burned out social worker who must break the news that he is leaving.

While You Were Dating, 20170212000000 +0000, A divorced couple meet online and end up going on a blind date together. After an awkward reunion, they decide to set each other up with their friends, but old habits never quite die. Stars Billy Baldwin and Stefanie VonPfetten.

Kiss at Pine Lake, 20120519000000 +0000, Luke Garvey buys his uncle's Camp Pine Lake only to find himself the owner of a sinking business. Zoe McConnell, Luke's girlfriend from years ago, wants him to sell until an old flame is rekindled.

A Way Back Home, 20130601000000 +0000, When a young musician returns to his hometown at Christmastime, he repairs old wounds and learns the power of forgiveness. Inspired by the paintings of Norman Rockwell. Stars Danny Glover, Austin Stowell and Kayla Ewell.

The Memory Book, 20140726000000 +0000, At a flea market, Chloe discovers a book of photos showcasing the romance of a young couple from the early seventies. She sets out on a literal and emotional journey to find the happy couple she knows only through photos.

The Music Teacher, 20120811000000 +0000, When music teacher Alyson Daley loses her after-school music program to budget cuts, her former students get together to put on a fund-raiser recreating a musical they performed years before.

When Sparks Fly, 20140628000000 +0000, Fireworks go off when Amy Peterson comes home to help save her family's annual 4th of July celebration and discovers she loves the man she left behind years ago to pursue her dreams of becoming a journalist. Stars Meghan Markle.

The Mystery Cruise, 20131005000000 +0000, Alvirah, Regan, and their husbands join a murder mystery cruise. But, when Alvirah sees a real murder attempt, she and Regan must find a way to keep the intended victim safe while trying to find proof to expose the murderer.

programme.title: Out of the Past
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E03, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's old friend John attempts to unearth their shared college memories.

programme.title: The Trouble with Love
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E04, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie feels upset after Grace admits she's been spending more time with Sam.

programme.title: Surprise Me
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E05, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie is surprised with adventurous outings by both Sam and John.

programme.title: Risk
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E06, Hallmark Original Series. After a great date with Sam, Cassie feels spellbound by their connection.

programme.title: Common Ground
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E07, Summoned to a planet by a communication code, the team is ambushed by Kolya, who has now created his own faction of Genii after being forced from the inner circle. While the rest of the team manages to escape, Sheppard is taken prisoner.

programme.title: Mckay And Mrs. Miller
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E08, McKay is called back to earth to convince his estranged sister, Jeannie Miller, to assist the Air Force. McKay and Jeannie travel to Atlantis and begin the experiment which is initially successful until a McKay from the parallel universe appears.

programme.title: Phantoms
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E09, Major Leonard's team fails to check in with Atlantis while on a mission. Following the energy readings in hope of finding Major Leonard and his men, McKay leads the team into a cave to discover that the cause the energy spike is a Wraith generator.

programme.title: The Return (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E10, The now awakened Ancients meet with O'Neill and Woolsey, thanking them for taking care of the city but also asking them to vacate Atlantis. While Ronon and Teyla stay in the Pegasus galaxy, the rest struggle to resume their lives on Earth.

programme.title: The Return (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E11, O'Neill and Woolsey, the lone survivors of the replicators' bloody coup, hide out in an abandoned section of the city. Knowing Landry has an order to nuke Atlantis if a foothold situation should ever arise, the two lay low awaiting their fate.

programme.title: Echoes
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E12, Teyla begins to see apparitions of ancients in distress and believes they are the ghosts of the Ancients recently massacred by the Replicators. McKay believes he's found the whale that saved him a year ago while trapped in a submerged puddle jumper.

programme.title: Common Descent
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E17, Destiny discovers the survivors of an interplanetary expedition who claim their civilization, Novus, was founded two thousand years earlier by Destiny’s crew. Suddenly, they are attacked by the Drones who have discovered a way to track Destiny.

programme.title: Epilogue
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E18, Returning the settlers to their home planet Novus, the Destiny crew discover the planet has been abandoned and is on the verge of seismic destruction. While pouring through an underground archive, the crew learns of the true origins of Novus.

programme.title: Blockade
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E19, When Destiny’s attempt to recharge in a star is foiled by attacking drones, Eli suggests a risky plan to recharge in a super-hot blue giant…a star so hot it could destroy the ship…unless someone stays aboard and keeps the ship under manual control.

programme.title: Gauntlet
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E20, After a battle, Destiny’s only option for survival is a jump to the next galaxy. Crew members return to Earth to say what may be their final farewells before embarking on their journey. But a risky stop may put the entire plan in jeopardy.

programme.title: Brief Candle
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E09, On the mysterious planet Argos, the beautiful Kynthia seduces Colonel Jack O'Neill, which means he's condemned to an Argosian lifespan of only a hundred days. As he turns gray, will his team succeed in their frantic search for a cure?

programme.title: Thor's Hammer
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E10, Looking for allies against the Goa'uld, the SG-1 team lands on Cimmeria, home of the legendary Norse gods. Teal'c and O'Neill are transported to an underground labyrinth of caves of the vicious creature Unas. Can Carter & Daniel rescue them?

programme.title: The Torment Of Tantalus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E11, Dr. Daniel Jackson discovers that in 1945, a young professor slipped through the Stargate, never to return. Together with his still living fiancée, the SG-1 team discovers the now aged professor trapped in a decaying fortress.

programme.title: Bloodlines
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E12, With the proviso that he bring back a Goa'uld larva for study, Teal'c (Christopher Judge) returns to Chulak to stop the Goa'uld from enslaving his son Rya'c. Trouble is, Rya'c needs a larva to survive - and the only one available is Teal'c's.

programme.title: Fire And Water
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E13, The SG-1 team returns from the planet Oannes in a panic and minus Daniel Jackson, who was last seen being consumed by a column of flames. But as his comrades mourn him on Earth, Daniel is the captive of an amphibious humanoid creature known as Nem.

programme.title: Hathor
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E14, The evil Goa'uld Hathor (Suanne Braun) escapes from a Mayan pyramid in Mexico. At the Stargate facility, she uses her charms to seduce the men into helping her take over the world. Can Samantha Carter and her female colleagues defeat her?

programme.title: Singularity
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E15, Capt. Carter returns with the sole survivor of a planetary plague - a little girl, Cassandra. As they become attached, Carter discovers the girl's terrible secret - a time bomb implanted by the Goa'uld. Can she save the girl - and the world?

programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E001, Summer vacation begins and Brenda starts lying to her parents to see Dylan. Brandon starts his summer job at the Beach Club.

programme.title: The Twins, the Trustee and the Very Big Trip
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E002, The Walsh's become upset over Brenda's relationship with Dylan, and Steve gets himself into a jam with twins.

programme.title: Too Little, Too Late / Paris, 75001
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E003, Brenda and Donna arrive in Paris while Dylan struggles with his father's plan to gain parole from prison.

programme.title: Sex, Lies and Volleyball / Photo Fini
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E004, While Donna works as a model in Paris, David wonders whether his heart belongs to Donna.

programme.title: Shooting Star / American in Paris
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E005, Brenda pretends to be French to spend time with an American student in Paris.

programme.title: Castles in the Sand
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E006, Brenda and Donna return from Paris, and Brenda suspects that Dylan may have been romantically involved with Kelly during the summer.

programme.title: A Song of Myself
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E007, It's back to school and trouble arises when Brenda, Steve, and Donna sign up to be "senior buddies".

programme.title: The Back Story
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E008, Brenda tests the bounds of her friendships after being interviewed for a sleazy tabloid TV show.

programme.title: Highwire
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E009, David accidentally walks in on Kelly while she's dressing after a shower. Brandon and Brenda grapple with future financial burdens while selecting colleges.

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E010, A shooting at a rival high school raises concerns at West Beverly High.

programme.title: A Presumption of Innocence

programme.title: Dolphin Quest

programme.title: The Natural

programme.title: Drop Zone

programme.title: Hot Summer Night
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E07, Hobie struggles with his irresponsible actions leading to a boating accident that leaves a girl in a coma. Jessie is gripped with fear after April tells her of a recent, job-related tragedy.

programme.title: Swept Away
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E08, Mitch befriends a boy who joins junior lifeguards in hopes of escaping a brutal home life. Jessie makes a passionate play for JD. Alex auditions for “Jeopardy!”

programme.title: The Swimmer
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E09, Upset about his failed marriage to Neely, Mitch goes for a day-long tower swim along the beach and encounters problems that distract from his own, including April and Craig's May/December romance, and reluctant heroes Cody and JD.

programme.title: Friends Forever

programme.title: The Edge

programme.title: The Big Blue

programme.title: Come Fly with Me
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E13, After he tries to save Tanner from his abusive father, Mitch ends up on the wrong side of the law. Meanwhile, Jessie's irresistible charm makes a stunt pilot's heart take flight.

programme.title: Boys will be Boys
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E14, When caught up in a high-risk adventure at sea, Craig tells Mitch a shocking secret. Meanwhile, Jessie works to creatively end JD and Cody's rivalry during a beachside triathlon, and April comes clean with Manny.

programme.title: Baywatch Grand Prix
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E15, Mitch feels the need for speed when Tanner's cousin, Damon Lusk, a race car driver in town for a major competition, visits Baywatch. Meanwhile, Newmie and the gang develop a TV show about lifeguards that they try to sell it into syndication.

programme.title: Baywatch Down Under, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E16, After Mitch's lifeguard buddy's ex-wife dies in Australia, Mitch and the team accompany him on a trip down under to meet the son he's never known.

programme.title: Baywatch Down Under, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E17, While team Baywatch prepares to compete against the Australian guards, Jake must choose between staying down under with his son or returning home. The competing lifeguards must put their intense rivalry aside to save a life.

programme.title: Water Dance
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E18, Cody learns a lesson in love when he and Mitch help a troubled violinist escape her dangerously overbearing mentor with a secret agenda. Meanwhile, Alex sets out to prove her worth at Baywatch by retaking the grueling rookie test with Jessie.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E19, Alex tries to save a diamond smuggler whose partners want him to "sleep with the fishes." Neely makes Hobie a tempting offer that divides the Buchannon household.
